div.ab:
يتسلّم أبو مفرّج من مطر ابن عمران
القادري عشرة أرادب وهي من غلّت
الحاج محمّد والسّلام

yatasallam ʾabū mufarriǧ:in min maṭari ĭbni ʿimrāna
ăl qādiriyyi ʿašaraẗa ʾarādiba wa hiya min ġallati
ăl ḥāǧǧi muḥammad:in wa ăs salāmu

Abū Mufarrij is to receive from Maṭar ibn ʿImrān
al-Qādirī ten irdabbs [of wheat], which are part of the ghalla-taxes (?)
[paid] by the ḥājj Muḥammad. Peace. [paid] by the ḥājj Muḥammad. Peace [be upon you].
